title: Biden says G7 must stick together as gold sanctions target Putin's 'war machine'
content:
1. Biden says G7 must stick together as gold sanctions target Putin's 'war machine'  Reuters
  2. Biden says G-7 will ban Russian gold imports over war on Ukraine  Fox News
  3. G-7 nations to announce import ban on Russian gold as Moscow sanctions widen  CNBC
  4. Biden, G7 leaders to agree on import ban on Russian gold - source  Yahoo News
  5. Biden: G-7 will ban Russian gold imports to deny Putin revenue for war in Ukraine  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: バイデン氏、プーチンの「戦争マシン」を標的とした金の制裁でG7は結束する必要があると発言
拜登称七国集团必须团结一致，因为黄金制裁针对普京的 "战争机器"。
拜登稱七國集團必須團結一致，因爲黃金制裁針對普京的 "戰爭機器"。
